plot: On Porky Pig's farm, a goose lays a golden egg and says that Daffy Duck laid it. Daffy is quite willing to take the credit and resultant fame, that is until Rocky the gangster kidnaps Daffy...
title: Golden Yeggs
plot_es: On Porky Pig's farm, a goose lays a golden egg and says that Daffy Duck laid it. Daffy is quite willing to take the credit and resultant fame, that is until Rocky the gangster kidnaps Daffy...
plot_en: On Porky Pig's farm, a goose lays a golden egg and says that Daffy Duck laid it. Daffy is quite willing to take the credit and resultant fame, that is until Rocky the gangster kidnaps Daffy...

cast.role: Daffy Duck /              Porky Pig /              Rocky the Gangster /              Nick /              Hotel Employee /              Chickens /              Goose
cast.name: Mel Blanc
